Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EncounterHistory|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Pack

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
EncounterHistory.encounter (encounter)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-referenceNote that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `EncounterHistory.encounter` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `EncounterHistory.encounter` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.

name: R5EncounterHistoryElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 EncounterHistory to FHIR R4 Encounter
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 EncounterHistory to FHIR R4.
